title: Accidental Shooting In New Roads
content:
POINTE COUPEE
New Roads -A child is in serious condition after an accidental shooting on Friday in Pointe Coupee Parish.
On Carver Street in New Roads, deputies say that a 14-year-old was trying to show a gun to an 11-year-old when the gun fired off and hit the 11-year-old. Read the story and see the video at .
